content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10.5, 10.5), boiler(position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a chest at position(-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0) 
-  Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0) 
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) 
-  Chests at positions (40.5, -80.5), (43.5, -82.5), (43.5, -81.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100} and status EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### Inserter system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5) and a chest at position (2.5, 0.5)

### Inserter system at position(0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5) and a chest at position (0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using furnace entities but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Ensure that the steam engine has a connected pipe with the required liquid before starting the engine
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no connected pipe
-  Ensure that the offshore pump has a connected pipe to transport the fluid before starting the pump
### Errors when using lab but having no power
-  Ensure that the lab has a connected power source before using it
